scripts.prestart: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const cp=require('child_process'); if(!fs.existsSync('node_modules')){ console.log('node_modules missing; installing dependencies...'); const r=cp.spawnSync('npm',['install','--omit=dev','--no-audit','--no-fund'],{stdio:'inherit',shell:true}); process.exit(r.status ?? 0); }"
